善い: (よい) - (also いい (all senses)) good/excellent/fine/nice/pleasant/agreeable; sufficient (can be used to turn down an offer)/ready/prepared; profitable (e.g. deal, business offer, etc.)/beneficial; OK
善い悪い: (よいわるい) - good or bad; merits or demerits; quality; suitability
善かれ: (よかれ) - all for the best; what is right
善かれと思う: (よかれとおもう) - (often as 良かれと思って) to wish to go well; to have good intentions
善かれ悪しかれ: (よかれあしかれ) - good or bad; right or wrong; for better or for worse; rightly or wrongly
善かろう: (よかろう) - that's right; very well; it would be best to ...
善くする: (よくする) - to make good/to improve; to do often; to do well
善くぞ: (よくぞ) - how admirably; how wonderfully; how skillfully
善くもそんなことを: (よくもそんなことを) - How dare you!; How can you have the nerve?
善くもまあ: (よくもまあ) - How dare you!; How can you have the nerve?
善く言う: (よくいう) - to say enough (as much as required)/to say plenty; to say well/to say cleverly/to say elegantly; to say often/to say frequently; (oft. as an admonition in the form of よく言うよ) to say without shame/to say impudently
善さげ: (よさげ) - seemingly good; (of) good appearance; looking good
善さ気: (よさげ) - seemingly good; (of) good appearance; looking good
善し: (えし) - (adj-ku)  good; excellent; fine; nice; pleasant; agreeable
善し悪し: (よしわるし) - right or wrong; good or bad; merits or demerits; quality; suitability
善は急げ: (ぜんはいそげ) - (ant: 急がば回れ) strike while the iron is hot
善みする: (よみする) - to praise; to extol; to applaud; to esteem
善処: (ぜんしょ) - handling carefully; tiding over; making best of; using discretion
善哉: (ぜんざい) - Well done!/Bravo!; zenzai/red bean soup made with Azuki beans (style varies according to region)
善哉善哉: (ぜんざいぜんざい) - (yoji) Well done!; Great!; Bravo!
善因: (ぜんいん) - (ant: 悪因) good cause (that will bring a good reward); good deed
善因善果: (ぜんいんぜんか) - (yoji) good action lead to good rewards; one good turn deserves another
善後: (ぜんご) - giving careful thought to the future; finishing up carefully
善後処置: (ぜんごしょち) - (yoji) remedial measure; preventive measure; the best way to cope with (meet) the situation
善後対策: (ぜんごたいさく) - (yoji) remedial measure; preventive measure; the best way to cope with (meet) the situation
善後措置: (ぜんごそち) - (yoji) remedial measure; preventive measure; the best way to cope with (meet) the situation
善後策: (ぜんごさく) - remedial measure; countermeasure; counter-measure; relief measure; remedy
善心: (ぜんしん) - virtue; moral sense; conscience
善性: (ぜんせい) - innate goodness of man
善悪の区別: (ぜんあくのくべつ) - discrimination between right and wrong; distinction between good and bad
善悪不二: (ぜんあくふに) - (yoji)  Good and evil are but two faces of the same coin
善悪二元論: (ぜんあくにげんろん) - good and evil dualism; Manicheanism
善意: (ぜんい) - virtuous mind; good intentions/good will; positive mindset; {law}  bona fides/good faith
善意の第三者: (ぜんいのだいさんしゃ) - {law} bona fide third party; bona fide third person
善意占有: (ぜんいせんゆう) - {law}  bona fide possession
善意通訳: (ぜんいつうやく) - (yoji) goodwill guide; volunteer guide and interpreter for foreign residents and tourists
善意銀行: (ぜんいぎんこう) - (yoji) center for collecting charitable contributions (money, goods, and-or services) and distributing them to people in need
善感: (ぜんかん) - successful vaccination; positive reaction
善戦: (ぜんせん) - fighting a good fight; putting up a good fight; fighting bravely
善戦苦闘: (ぜんせんくとう) - (yoji) putting up a good fight against some odds
善智識: (ぜんぢしき) - friend who guides one to Buddhism through teaching
善書: (ぜんしょ) - beautiful calligraphy; calligrapher; good book
善根宿: (ぜんこんやど) - free lodging (for pilgrims, etc.)
善業: (ぜんごう) - (ant: 悪業) good deeds
善玉コレステロール: (ぜんだまコレステロール) - HDL cholesterol; high-density lipoprotein cholesterol; good cholesterol
善玉菌: (ぜんだまきん) - good germ; good bacteria
善男善女: (ぜんなんぜんにょ) - (yoji) pious men and women
善知識: (ぜんぢしき) - friend who guides one to Buddhism through teaching
善祓: (よしはらえ) - purification to invite good fortune
善神: (ぜんしん) - good God/good deities; true teachings of Buddha
善管: (ぜんかん) - good management; good manager
善美: (ぜんび) - the good and the beautiful
善行: (ぜんこう) - (ant: 悪行) good deed; good conduct; benevolence
善逝: (ぜんぜい) - Sugata (the well-gone; epithet of Buddha)
善道: (ぜんどう) - path of virtue; righteousness
善隣: (ぜんりん) - good neighbour; good neighbor
善隣友好: (ぜんりんゆうこう) - (yoji) neighbourly friendship; neighborly friendship
善隣外交: (ぜんりんがいこう) - (yoji) good-neighbor diplomacy; a good-neighbor policy
善隣政策: (ぜんりんせいさく) - Good Neighbor Policy
善隣関係: (ぜんりんかんけい) - good neighborly relations; good neighbourly relations
喇叭水仙: (ラッパズイセン) - wild daffodil (Narcissus pseudonarcissus); Lent lily
喇叭飲み: (らっぱのみ) - drinking straight from a bottle
喉がかわく: (のどがかわく) - to be thirsty
喉が乾く: (のどがかわく) - to be thirsty
喉が渇く: (のどがかわく) - to be thirsty
喉に刺さった骨: (のどにささったほね) - bone stuck in one's throat
喉を潤す: (のどをうるおす) - to appease one's thirst; to wet one's whistle
